title: Internet Loss should not result in a ban
body:
What do you guys think?

I am a person who has bad internet. It doesn't help that my sister is always on youtube, giving me high ping. I disconnect a lot, and have now recieved a 20 min low queue because of a disconnect

What im asking is, do you think we should get banned just as our internet is bad or not?

replies.body:
Hey Sherk420,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [LeaverBuster] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!
